Pope halts speech saying he has 'a touch of bronchitis'Pope Francis was unable to complete a speech on Friday, complaining of "a touch of bronchitis" during an address to a group of French religious communications experts at the Vatican. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:46:54 GMT 2B47ASYJUZO65HZP3BCCR2TDNY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-halts-speech-saying-he-has-a-touch-bronchitis-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
UN deplores Israel's 'systematic' refusal to grant access to north GazaThe United Nations humanitarian office said on Friday that Israeli authorities were systematically denying it access to northern Gaza to deliver aid and this had significantly hindered the humanitarian operation there. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:38:10 GMT VB5FSPWIJZNGDAILIDQLAQXALQ https://www.reuters.com/world/un-deplores-israels-systematic-refusal-grant-access-north-gaza-2024-01-12/Gabrielle Tétrault-Farber世界
Oil tankers divert from Red Sea after US, UK strikes in YemenAt least four oil tankers have diverted course from the Red Sea since overnight strikes by the U.S. and Britain on Houthi targets in Yemen, shipping data from LSEG and Kpler showed. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:29:33 GMT G5WGFCOPV5NENJT4I457PD6XGM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/oil-tankers-divert-red-sea-after-us-uk-strikes-yemen-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东
UK legal advice says Yemen strikes justified under international lawThe British government on Friday published a summary of its legal advice, which said its decision to strike Houthi military targets in Yemen was justified under international law. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:26:14 GMT OLW36JBZJVMH5L7U2IYM3UJXPY https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-legal-advice-says-yemen-strikes-justified-under-international-law-2024-01-12/Reuters世界英国
In Brazil, drones take flight in Rio in high-tech reforestation pushBrazil's seaside city of Rio de Janeiro, famed for its crowded beaches and lush surrounding hills, is sending drones buzzing into the air to disperse seeds, part of a high-tech push that seeks to speed up local reforestation efforts. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 11:06:15 GMT WH323YI5LFOVDH5ARJVGM6S7PI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-drones-take-flight-rio-high-tech-reforestation-push-2024-01-12/Reuters世界美洲
Ukrainian presidential aide confident mobilisation bill will pass soonA senior Ukrainian presidential aide said on Friday he was confident that an amended bill seeking to tighten Ukraine's mobilisation laws would be passed in the coming days or weeks, despite hitting setbacks this week. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:57:35 GMT K3HPW62SK5MFDFU7NXNRREEQV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-presidential-aide-confident-mobilization-bill-will-pass-soon-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Moscow calls U.S. plan to confiscate Russian assets '21st century piracy'The Russian Foreign Ministry on Friday called a U.S. plan to confiscate up to $300 billion in frozen Russian assets to help rebuild Ukraine "21st century piracy" and said Moscow would retaliate harshly if it happened. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:53:06 GMT PN6NH2JCB5IDBFLRLNIVZRCAMM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moscow-calls-us-plan-confiscate- Russian-assets-21st- century-piracy-2024-01-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Houthi attacks on shipping in Red Sea persist, U.S. and allies strike backThe United States and Britain carried out strikes from the air and sea against Houthi military targets in Yemen in response to the movement's attacks on ships in the Red Sea. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:52:25 GMT TLOB5OT3D5KWNPITQBGLM7R3ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthi-attacks-shipping-red-sea-persist-us-allies-strike-back-2024-01-12/Reuters世界中东
British conductor Jan Latham-Koenig charged with child sexual offencesAcclaimed British conductor Jan Latham-Koenig has been charged by police in London with a child sexual offences, authorities said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:38:56 GMT FF6P2PBP7VICBMD7BUTZLZULAU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/british-conductor-jan-latham-koenig-charged-with-child- Sex-offences-2024-01-12/Reuters世界英国
Mass killer Breivik still dangerous and should stay isolated in Norway jail, court hearsAnders Behring Breivik, the far-right fanatic who killed 77 people in twin attacks in Norway in 2011, remains "very dangerous" and should be kept in isolation in prison, a court heard on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:20:12 GMT WIVXCLUS55N5FEJWM5AB2FSA34 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/mass-killer-breivik-still-dangerous-should-stay-isolated-norway-jail-court-hears-2024-01-12/Gwladys Fouche世界欧洲
Poland is cooperating with Nord Stream probe, minister saysPoland has been cooperating with allies in a probe into the sabotage of the Nord Stream natural gas pipelines, the minister in charge of Polish intelligence services said, denying a newspaper report that it was hindering investigations. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 10:12:39 GMT RPFYXY7IXVOOHNP77B3GNNVSIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-is-cooperating-with-nord-stream-probe-minister-says-2024-01-12/Marek Strzelecki世界欧洲
